title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-287)
description: On May 21, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.0.1, 17.11.3 and 17.10.7
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.0.1, 17.11.3 and 17.10.7
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
